name: Splash Moist Towel Natural Forest
description: The intriguing and enchanting aroma of natural forests come alive to keep you refreshed and feeling at one with nature. This is an antiseptic and hygienic face and hand wipe which will help you to be safe through cleanliness and hygiene. This is a Sri Lankan product manufactured to suite our tropical climatic conditions. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
